item.title: 2 Ways to Trade Qualcomm Ahead of November’s Earnings
item.description: Qualcomm’s chart and fundamentals look solid, but the $180 ceiling looms large. Next month's earnings will be an much-watched update for investors.

item.title: Lululemon: 2 Signs the Bottom Is In, and 1 Sign It Isn’t
item.description: Lululemon is oversold, undervalued, and starting to show signs of a bottom. But ongoing downgrades mean it's not out of danger just yet.

item.title: Got 1K to Invest? These 3 Stocks Are Still Attractive Buys

item.title: Why Micron Stock Could Soar 35% on AI Memory Demand
item.description: Micron is well-positioned for an unprecedented demand boom driven by AI centered on HBM3E capability, which will last for years.

item.title: 5 Reasons Coca-Cola Stock Will Hit New Highs This Year
item.description: Coca-Cola's stock price is on track to reach new highs by year's end and could continue to rally over the next two years as growth accelerates.
